summary: This is an FBI Electronic Communication documenting a request for assistance from Swiss police regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Karl Erivan HAU. It appears to be part of international investigative coordination.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject in a Swiss police request for assistance, indicating international investigative interest.

persons.name: Karl Erivan HAU
persons.context: Named alongside Jeffrey Epstein in a Swiss police request for assistance.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects in the same Swiss police request for assistance, connecting them in an international investigation.

events.title: FBI records Swiss police request
events.description: The FBI drafts an Electronic Communication documenting a request for assistance from Swiss police regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Karl Erivan HAU.

keyFacts: Swiss police requested assistance regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Karl Erivan HAU in 2020.
The FBI documented this international investigative request in an Electronic Communication.
The document indicates ongoing or posthumous international investigative interest in Epstein's network.
Karl Erivan HAU is identified as a subject of interest alongside Epstein in this Swiss request.
